Class RemoteControlTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • RemoteControlTest

  • public class RemoteControlTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Tests the remote control app for successful Kiva missions, unsuccessful Kiva missions, and command errors (exceptions). This file should be accessed as an uncompiled java file. Each test can be run from main by uncommenting the method call line.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RemoteControlTest() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      static void testCommands()
      This method performs two tests.
      static void testFails()
      Checks for various failures that do not throw exceptions.
      static void testIllegalDropZoneException()
      Test 8 checks for attempt to take drop a pod outside a drop zone.
      static void testMoveAfterDrop()
      Test 4 checks for extraneous commands after drop condition.
      static void testNoPodException()
      Test 7 checks for attempt to take pod at an empty location.
      static void testObstacleException()
      Test 9 test for a simple Kiva collision into an obstacle.
      static void testValidPaths()
      Tests successful Kiva missions for maps sample_floor_map1.txt, sample_floor_map2.txt, and sample_floor_map3.txt.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • testCommands

        public static void testCommands()
        This method performs two tests. This method was used for initial testing of the RemoteControl class only. Map files must be in the Default Package source directory. Input: 
        RFFFFFTRF
        Expected Output: 
        { TURN_RIGHT, FORWARD, FORWARD, FORWARD, FORWARD, FORWARD, TAKE, TURN_RIGHT, FORWARD }
        Input: 
        RFFFFFTRB
        Expected Output: 
        Expected Output: Exception in thread "main" kivaworld.InvalidKivaCommandException: Invalid Kiva Command: B

      • testFails

        public static void testFails()
        Checks for various failures that do not throw exceptions. Test 5 checks for single command followed by return. Test 6 checks for successful take without drop

      • testIllegalDropZoneException

        public static void testIllegalDropZoneException()
        Test 8 checks for attempt to take drop a pod outside a drop zone. Map: sample_floor_map2.txt Input: RFFFFFFLFFFTRFFRFFD Expected Output: Exception in thread "main" IllegalDropZoneException: The kiva attempted to DROP not on a DROP_ZONE at location (11,3)

      • testMoveAfterDrop

        public static void testMoveAfterDrop()
        Test 4 checks for extraneous commands after drop condition. Map: sample_floor_map1.txt Input: 
        RFFFFFTFFFFFFFDR
        Expected Output: 
        I'm sorry. The Kiva Robot did not pick up the pod and then drop it off correctly

      • testNoPodException

        public static void testNoPodException()
        Test 7 checks for attempt to take pod at an empty location. Map: sample_floor_map2.txt Input: RFFFFFLFFFTRFFRFFFD Expected Output: Exception in thread "main" NoPodException: The kiva attempted to TAKE a POD while there is no POD at location (8,1)

      • testObstacleException

        public static void testObstacleException()
        Test 9 test for a simple Kiva collision into an obstacle. Map: sample_floor_map1.txt Input: F Expected Output: Exception in thread "main" IllegalMoveException: The kiva ran into an obstacle at location (1,0).

      • testValidPaths

        public static void testValidPaths()
        Tests successful Kiva missions for maps sample_floor_map1.txt, sample_floor_map2.txt, and sample_floor_map3.txt. Expected Output: Successfully picked up the pod and dropped it off. Thank you!
